thread.title: Football: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez's stay in Arsenal could be a short one
thread.title_full: Football: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez's stay in Arsenal could be a short one

title: Football: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez's stay in Arsenal could be a short one
text:
By Game Yetu Friday, February 17th 2017 at 19:14 
Lucas Perez is prepared to quit Arsenal at the end of the season, according to reports. 
Goal say the 28-year-old forward has ambitions of making Spain's 2018 World Cup squad and knows he must play more if that is to become a reality. 
Perez joined Arsenal from Deportivo La Coruna last summer and has scored six times in 17 appearances for the club. 
He is reportedly confused as to why he hasn't been given an extended run in the team at any point this season by boss Arsene Wenger.
